title: versioning app does not show version in webinterface (related to  #4427)
body:
### expected behaviour
create files:
ordnerrã¼cken.doc and ordnerrucken.doc
modify ordnerrã¼cken.doc
modify ordnerrucken.doc

webinterface:
1 versions available for ordnerrucken.doc
1 versions available for ordnerrã¼cken.doc
### actual behaviour

no other versions available for ordnerrucken.doc
2 versions available for ordnerrã¼cken.doc
### server configuration
operating system: windows 7 prof

web server: apache

database: mysql or sqlite

php version: 5.4

owncloud version: 5.0.10 or 5.0.9

### client configuration
browser: any

operating system: windows 7, xp
### some thoughts:
the version files get created succesfully, but after slugifying the file names, the app loses information to correctly assign the version files. this issue is related to the fix #4427 of issue #4425.
